item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Richard Dawkins
item.description: "We are all atheists about most of the gods that humanity has ever believed in. Some of us just go one god further." -- Richard Dawkins

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Richard Dawkins
item.description: "The God of the Old Testament is arguably the most unpleasant character in all fiction: jealous and proud of it; a petty, unjust, unforgiving control-freak; a vindictive, bloodthirsty ethnic cleanser; a misogynistic, homophobic, racist, infanticidal, genocidal, filicidal, pestilential, megalomaniacal, sadomasochistic, capriciously malevolent bully." -- Richard Dawkins

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Christopher Hitchens
item.description: "That which can be asserted without evidence, can be dismissed without evidence." -- Christopher Hitchens

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Marianne Williamson
item.description: "Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness that most frightens us. We ask ourselves, 'Who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented, fabulous?' Actually, who are you not to be? You are a child of God. Your playing small does not serve the world. There is nothing enlightened about shrinking so that other people won't feel insecure around you. We are all meant to shine, as children do. We were born to make manifest the glory of God that is within us. It's not just in some of us; it's in everyone. And as we let our own light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same. As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence automatically liberates others." -- Marianne Williamson

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Cornel West
item.description: "The country is in deep trouble. We've forgotten that a rich life consists fundamentally of serving others, trying to leave the world a little better than you found it. We need the courage to question the powers that be, the courage to be impatient with evil and patient with people, the courage to fight for social justice. In many instances we will be stepping out on nothing, and just hoping to land on something. But that's the struggle. To live is to wrestle with despair, yet never allow despair to have the last word." -- Cornel West

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Teeth are always in style." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I know, up on top you are seeing great sights, but down here at the bottom we, too, should have rights." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "It is better to know how to learn than to know." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "For a host, above all, must be kind to his guests." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Cat, you ruined mom's dress!" "Honey, it was ruined when she bought it." -- Dr. Seuss
